author: Brian Turner
method: Arrange the sliced halibut on a serving plate. Drizzle with lemon juice, season with freshly ground black pepper and garnish with tomato wedges. Serve chilled.
ingredients: 100g/3½ very fresh skinless halibut steak, thinly sliced,  ½ lemon, juice only,  freshly ground black pepper,  ½ tomato, cut into wedges, to garnish
